text: Sandeep Guleria is a surgeon from Kangra, Himachal Pradesh, India. In 2019, Guleria was honoured with the Padma Shri award by Ram Nath Kovind, the President of India, for his contribution to the field of medicine (surgery).Nurpur now has 3 Padma Shri Awardees == Life == Guleria was born in Mazra, a small village in the Indora tehsil of Kangra, Himachal Pradesh. His father is physician Jagdev Singh Guleria and he is the younger brother of physician Randeep Guleria. Guleria works at Apollo Hospitals as a senior consultant of GI Surgery and Transplantation. He is the president of Indian Society of Organ Transplantation (ISOT), Delhi. In 2019, Guleria was honoured with the Padma Shri award by Ram Nath Kovind, the President of India, for his contribution to the field of medicine (surgery). == References == Category:Indian surgeons Category:21st-century surgeons Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Sandeep Guleria (surgeon)
